qwirkle

Class ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • qwirkle.Player
      • qwirkle.ComputerPlayer

  • public class ComputerPlayer
extends Player
    ComputerPlayer that extends Player Used by the server when a client wants to play against the computer Used by the client when a client wants to play as computer
    Author:
    Niek Tijink & Thomas Kolner

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class qwirkle.Player

        move

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComputerPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      creates a new ComputerPlayer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String determineMove(Board board)
      the method that determines what a computerplayer will do in a move (except for the first move) It will first collect all possible places where a tile can be placed After that, the AI will try to place one Tile on every possible place, test the move and save the score After all places and all tiles have been tried, the method returns the move with the best score THIS AI ONLY PLACES ONE TILE AT A TIME
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      java.lang.String makeFirstMove(Board board)
      Makes a first move for the computerplayer

        public java.lang.String makeFirstMove(Board board)
        Makes a first move for the computerplayer
        Parameters:

      • determineMove

        public java.lang.String determineMove(Board board)
        the method that determines what a computerplayer will do in a move (except for the first move) It will first collect all possible places where a tile can be placed After that, the AI will try to place one Tile on every possible place, test the move and save the score After all places and all tiles have been tried, the method returns the move with the best score THIS AI ONLY PLACES ONE TILE AT A TIME
        Specified by:
        determineMove in class Player
        Parameters:
        board - the current board
        Returns:
        the move (as String)

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
